name: War in the Sky (oathmilks)
description:
War in the Sky is a Tactical-RPG where you need to defeat your enemies or reach some destination.

How to play: click using your mouse

This game is submitted to Boundless Game Jam with theme "one Button" which in this case is only one mouse click (left-click).

Due to lack of playtesting (see submission time lol), there are several bugs that you will encounter troughout the game (especially at level 5). Sorry about that!
